9 Everytown for Gun Safety: Try Landscaping for Home Defense posted 1 hour ago by flashersenpai 2 comments award share report block Rob Romano @2Aupdates • 6h Everytown's home defense plan: Rob Romano @2Aupdates • 9h Everytown says that instead of buying a gun, you should try "landscaping", getting a dog, and "being careful on social media" Note that the source for this is Everytown's gun "expert"
